reward.student_learning: When faced with complex, multi-variable optimization problems, systematically break down the analysis into distinct phases: (1) current state assessment, (2) identification of key constraints and cost drivers, (3) quantitative modeling of scenarios and trade-offs, (4) development of a prioritized, time-bound action plan, and (5) a comprehensive risk assessment with mitigations. Ensure all calculations are explicit and support the final recommendations.

steps.description:
Produce the complete answer for the task in a single response.
Ensure the output matches the requested format and includes any necessary reasoning.
